abstract: Profile of Milwaukee Brewers principal owner Mark Attanasio, whose team clinched their first division title in 29 years on September 23.
snippet: Lured by the chance to buy a small percentage of the small-market Brewers, Mark Attanasio ended up with controlling interest and an idea of how to be a contender.
lead_paragraph: Lured by the chance to buy a small percentage of the small-market Brewers, Mark Attanasio ended up with controlling interest and an idea of how to be a contender.

headline.main: Owner Goes All In on the Brewers
headline.print_headline: Keeping Brewers in the Financial Ballpark
headline.seo: Mark Attanasio Goes All In on the Brewers
